unnormalised: My grandfather, Subedar Major Ram Singh, always used to tell us stories of his time in the Indian Army. He served with great pride for 32 yrs, retiring in '98. I remember him telling us about his CO, Col. Sharma, who was a really strict but fair officer. And then there was Capt. Khan, always up for a laugh, but super efficient during ops. Grandfather used to say it was an honour to serve under officers like them, even though life at the border could be tough, especially during '88-'89. He always instilled in us the value of discipline and dedication to our country.
